con:part.con:content: <wsdl:definitions targetNamespace="http://bls.ch/tap/contract/TicketAccount/v1" xmlns:wsdl="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/" xmlns="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/soap/" xmlns:tns="http://bls.ch/tap/contract/TicketAccount/v1" xmlns:ctx="http://bls.ch/tap/schema/TicketAccountingRecord/v1"> <wsdl:documentation>TicketAccountService</wsdl:documentation> <wsdl:types> <xsd:schema attributeFormDefault="unqualified" elementFormDefault="qualified" targetNamespace="http://bls.ch/tap/contract/TicketAccount/v1"> <xsd:import namespace="http://bls.ch/tap/schema/TicketAccountingRecord/v1" schemaLocation="TicketAccountingRecord-v1_0.xsd"/> <xsd:element name="AccountTicketMsg" type="tns:AccountTicketType"/> <xsd:element name="AccountTicketMsgResponse" type="tns:AccountTicketResponseType"/> <xsd:complexType name="AccountTicketType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="AccountTicket" type="ctx:TicketAccountingRecordType"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="AccountTicketResponseType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="AccountTicket" type="ctx:TicketAccountingRecordResponseType"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:schema> </wsdl:types> <wsdl:message name="AccountTicketMsg"> <wsdl:part name="parameters" element="tns:AccountTicketMsg"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="AccountTicketMsgResponse"> <wsdl:part name="parameters" element="tns:AccountTicketMsgResponse"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:portType name="TicketAccountServicePortType"> <wsdl:operation name="AccountTicket"> <wsdl:input message="tns:AccountTicketMsg"/> <wsdl:output message="tns:AccountTicketMsgResponse"/> </wsdl:operation> </wsdl:portType> <wsdl:binding name="TicketAccountServiceSOAP11Binding" type="tns:TicketAccountServicePortType"> <soap:binding style="document" transport="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/http"/> <wsdl:operation name="AccountTicket"> <soap:operation style="document" soapAction="http://bls.ch/tap/contract/TicketAccount/v1/AccountTicket"/> <wsdl:input> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> </wsdl:binding> <wsdl:service name="TicketAccountService"> <wsdl:port name="TicketAccountServiceSOAP11port_http" binding="tns:TicketAccountServiceSOAP11Binding"> <soap:operation soapAction="http://bls.ch/tap/contract/TicketAccount/AccountTicket"/> <soap:address location="http://127.0.0.1:8280/services/TicketAccountService"/> </wsdl:port> </wsdl:service> </wsdl:definitions>

<xsd:schema targetNamespace="http://bls.ch/tap/schema/TicketAccountingRecord/v1" elementFormDefault="qualified" version="1.0" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:tns="http://bls.ch/tap/schema/TicketAccountingRecord/v1"> <xsd:element name="TicketAccountingRecord" type="tns:TicketAccountingRecordType"/> <xsd:complexType name="TicketAccountingRecordType"> <xsd:sequence minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:element name="Person" type="tns:PersonType" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="10"/> <xsd:element name="Reservation" type="tns:ReservationType" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="10"/> <xsd:element name="Payment" type="tns:PaymentType" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="10"/> <xsd:element name="Ticket" type="tns:TicketType" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="10"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="TicketAccountingRecordResponse" type="tns:TicketAccountingRecordResponseType"/> <xsd:complexType name="TicketAccountingRecordResponseType"> <xsd:sequence minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:element name="ReturnCode" type="xsd:unsignedInt" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"/> <xsd:element name="ReturnMessage" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="Person" type="tns:PersonType"/> <xsd:complexType name="PersonType"> <xsd:sequence minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="20"> <xsd:element name="Birthdate" type="xsd:date" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"/> <xsd:element name="Firstname" type="xsd:string" form="qualified" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1" default="Max"/> <xsd:element name="Lastname" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1" default="Muster"/> <xsd:element name="Payment" type="tns:PaymentType" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"/> <xsd:element name="Ticket" type="tns:TicketType" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"/> <xsd:element name="Reservation" type="tns:ReservationType" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="10"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="Payment" type="tns:PaymentType"/> <xsd:complexType name="PaymentType"> <xsd:sequence minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="10"> <xsd:element name="DateTime" type="xsd:dateTime" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"/> <xsd:element name="PaymentMedhod" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1" default="VBM"/> <xsd:element name="Ticket" type="tns:TicketType" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"/> <xsd:element name="Reservation" type="tns:ReservationType" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="Reservation" type="tns:ReservationType"/> <xsd:complexType name="ReservationType"> <xsd:sequence minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="10"> <xsd:element name="AmountInCents" type="xsd:unsignedInt" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"/> <xsd:element name="Curency" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"/> <xsd:element name="VatPercentInCents" type="xsd:unsignedInt" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"/> <xsd:element name="Ticket" type="tns:TicketType" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:simpleType name="ClassTypeEnum"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:unsignedInt"> <xsd:enumeration value="1"/> <xsd:enumeration value="2"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="TripTypeEnum"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:enumeration value="EINFACH"/> <xsd:enumeration value="RETOUR"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="TravellerTypeEnum"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:enumeration value="PERSON"/> <xsd:enumeration value="FAHRRAD"/> <xsd:enumeration value="HUND"/> <xsd:enumeration value="KIND"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:element name="Ticket" type="tns:TicketType"/> <xsd:complexType name="TicketType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="Class" type="tns:ClassTypeEnum" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1" default="2"/> <xsd:element name="Travellertype" type="tns:TravellerTypeEnum" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1" default="PERSON"/> <xsd:element name="TicketValidFrom" type="xsd:dateTime" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"/> <xsd:element name="TicketValidToDate" type="xsd:dateTime" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"/> <xsd:element name="Trip" type="tns:TripTypeEnum" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1" default="EINFACH"/> <xsd:element name="UsageDurationTag" type="xsd:unsignedInt" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1" default="1"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:schema>

con:call.name: Request 1
